summary: Gene Eliza Tierney  was an American actress.
full_text:
Gene Eliza Tierney  was an American film and stage actress. Acclaimed as a great beauty, she became established as a leading lady. Tierney was best known for her portrayal of the title character in the film Laura , and was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Ellen Berent Harland in Leave Her to Heaven .
Tierney's other roles include Martha Strable Van Cleve in Heaven Can Wait , Isabel Bradley Maturin in The Razor's Edge , Lucy Muir in The Ghost and Mrs. Muir , Ann Sutton in Whirlpool , Maggie Carleton McNulty in The Mating Season , and Anne Scott in The Left Hand of God .
title: Gene Tierney
